snippet.title: Stronghold Crusader 2 - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Out Now - http://store.steampowered.com/app/232890/

The time has finally come!

Stronghold Crusader 2 is now available for purchase on PC, with players able to pick up the game on Steam, Humble Store, Amazon, GetGames, GamersGate and GAME. Available in both standard and special editions, Stronghold Crusader 2 is the long awaited sequel to the original castle sim.

Our latest Stronghold features new units, siege equipment, dynamic events, co-op play, realistic unit abilities, 8 player multiplayer and of course skirmish mode! For the past two years Stronghold Crusader 2 has been a labor of love for our developers to work on, with the goal of creating the ultimate 3D Stronghold game. We hope you have as much fun playing the game as we did making it.

Want to discuss Stronghold Crusader 2? Head over to the official forums - http://forum.strongholdcrusader2.com/

Like – http://on.fb.me/1ahgH0z
Follow – http://bit.ly/139lVs8
Subscribe – http://bit.ly/ffstube
Play – http://strongholdcrusader2.com
